text: David William Cross MacMillan (born March 16, 1968)Professor David MacMillan FRS is a Scottish-American chemist. He is the James S. McDonnell Distinguished University Professor of Chemistry at Princeton University.A short interview of Professor MacMillan is available on the Eminent Organic Chemists Page provided by the ACS Organic Division He shared the 2021 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with Benjamin List for his work on organocatalysis. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish chemists
title: David MacMillan
